tidbits.title: Island Biodiversity
tidbits.description: Comoros, known as the 'Perfumed Islands,' hosts rich biodiversity, including unique flora and fauna, with a significant portion of its wildlife found nowhere else on Earth.

tidbits.title: Cultural Blend
tidbits.description: The islands blend African, Arab, and French influences, showcased in traditional music, dance, and the fusion of cultures seen in daily life.

tidbits.title: Volcanic Landscape
tidbits.description: Comoros is marked by volcanic landscapes, including Mount Karthala on Grande Comore, offering opportunities for hiking and exploration.
